description: Lists all in-progress, completed, or failed EngagementFromOpportunity tasks that were initiated by the caller's account.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request. Valid values are: AWS: Retrieves the request from the production AWS environment. Sandbox: Retrieves the request from a sandbox environment used for testing or development purposes.

parameters.name: EngagementIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters tasks by the identifiers of the engagements they created or are associated with. (string) ---

parameters.name: OpportunityIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the original opportunity associated with this task. (string) ---

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting criteria for the returned results. This allows you to order the tasks based on specific attributes. Specifies the field by which the task list should be sorted. Determines the order in which the sorted results are presented.

nested_params.name: SortBy
nested_params.description: Specifies the field by which the task list should be sorted.

nested_params.name: SortOrder
nested_params.description: Determines the order in which the sorted results are presented.

parameters.name: TaskIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters tasks by their unique identifiers. Use this when you want to retrieve information about specific tasks. (string) ---

parameters.name: TaskStatus
parameters.description: Filters the tasks based on their current status. This allows you to focus on tasks in specific states. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token used for pagination to retrieve the next page of results. If there are more results available, this field will contain a token that can be used in a subsequent API call to retrieve the next page. If there are no more results, this field will be null or an empty string.

nested_items.name: TaskSummaries
nested_items.description: TaskSummaries An array of TaskSummary objects containing details about each task.

nested_items.name: EngagementId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the engagement created as a result of the task. This field is populated when the task is completed successfully.

nested_items.name: EngagementInvitationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Engagement Invitation.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A detailed message providing additional information about the task, especially useful in case of failures. This field may contain error details or other relevant information about the task's execution.

nested_items.name: OpportunityId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the original Opportunity from which the Engagement is being created. This field helps track the source of the Engagement creation task.

nested_items.name: ReasonCode
nested_items.description: A code indicating the specific reason for a task failure. This field is populated when the task status is FAILED and provides a categorized reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotJobId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the resource snapshot job associated with this task, if a snapshot was created as part of the Engagement creation process.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp indicating when the task was initiated, in RFC 3339 5.6 date-time format.

nested_items.name: TaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) uniquely identifying this task within AWS. This ARN can be used for referencing the task in other AWS services or APIs.

nested_items.name: TaskId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a specific task.

nested_items.name: TaskStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the task.
